subject: Television
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Los Angeles said that Jay Mariotti, who is an AOL FanHouse sports columnist and a panelist on ESPN’s “Around the Horn,” would be charged in connection with what they say was a domestic violence incident involving his girlfriend.
snippet: Prosecutors in Los Angeles said that Jay Mariotti, who is an AOL FanHouse sports columnist and a panelist on ESPN’s “Around the Horn,” would be charged in connection with what they say was a domestic violence incident involving his girlfriend.
